--------------------------------------------------
Hello,

 

I hope you are doing well.

 

Kindly note that we have an insurance invoice from CIGNA and there was an amount related to Employee “RAMEL CENZIA” as appear on the attached invoice and allocation.

As appear in the staff list for Mar’24 this employee was under LVMH FG EAU LLC - CELINE RETAIL, but now they rejected the recharge and said that this employee isn’t under them.

Could you please check and advice, if you need further details I can support.

 

 

Best Regards,

 

 

RASHEED ALNAJAR	
ASSOCIATE SENIOR ACCOUNTANT	
REAL FZE JORDAN	
AMMAN
